label: School
desc: student's school (binary: 'GP' - Gabriel Pereira or 'MS' - Mousinho da Silveira)

label: Sex
desc: student's sex (binary: 'F' - female or 'M' - male)

label: Age
desc: student's age (numeric: from 15 to 22)

label: Address Type
desc: student's home address type (binary: 'U' - urban or 'R' - rural)

label: Family Size
desc: family size (binary: 'LE3' - less or equal to 3 or 'GT3' - greater than 3)

label: Parents Cohabitation
desc: parent's cohabitation status (binary: 'T' - living together or 'A' - apart)

label: Mother's Education
desc: mother's education (numeric: 0 - none, 1 - primary education (4th grade), 2 â€“ 5th to 9th grade, 3 â€“ secondary education or 4 â€“ higher education)

label: Father's Education
desc: father's education (numeric: 0 - none, 1 - primary education (4th grade), 2 â€“ 5th to 9th grade, 3 â€“ secondary education or 4 â€“ higher education)

label: Mother's Job
desc: mother's job (nominal: 'teacher', 'health' care related, civil 'services' (e.g. administrative or police), 'at_home' or 'other')

label: Father's Job
desc: father's job (nominal: 'teacher', 'health' care related, civil 'services' (e.g. administrative or police), 'at_home' or 'other')

label: Reason to Choose School
desc: reason to choose this school (nominal: close to 'home', school 'reputation', 'course' preference or 'other')

label: Guardian
desc: student's guardian (nominal: 'mother', 'father' or 'other')

label: Travel Time
desc: home to school travel time (numeric: 1 - <15 min., 2 - 15 to 30 min., 3 - 30 min. to 1 hour, or 4 - >1 hour)

label: Study Time
desc: weekly study time (numeric: 1 - <2 hours, 2 - 2 to 5 hours, 3 - 5 to 10 hours, or 4 - >10 hours)

label: Past Class Failures
desc: number of past class failures (numeric: n if 1<=n<3, else 4)

label: Extra Educational Support
desc: extra educational support (binary: yes or no)

label: Family Educational Support
desc: family educational support (binary: yes or no)

label: Extra Paid Classes
desc: extra paid classes within the course subject (Math or Portuguese) (binary: yes or no)

label: Extra-Curricular Activities
desc: extra-curricular activities (binary: yes or no)

label: Attended Nursery
desc: attended nursery school (binary: yes or no)

label: Wants Higher Education
desc: wants to take higher education (binary: yes or no)

label: Internet Access
desc: Internet access at home (binary: yes or no)

label: Romantic Relationship
desc: with a romantic relationship (binary: yes or no)

label: Family Relationships
desc: quality of family relationships (numeric: from 1 - very bad to 5 - excellent)

label: Free Time
desc: free time after school (numeric: from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

label: Going Out with Friends
desc: going out with friends (numeric: from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

label: Workday Alcohol Consumption
desc: workday alcohol consumption (numeric: from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

label: Weekend Alcohol Consumption
desc: weekend alcohol consumption (numeric: from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

label: Current Health Status
desc: current health status (numeric: from 1 - very bad to 5 - very good)

label: School Absences
desc: number of school absences (numeric: from 0 to 93)

label: First Period Grade
desc: first period grade (numeric: from 0 to 20)

label: Second Period Grade
desc: second period grade (numeric: from 0 to 20)

label: Final Grade
desc: final grade (numeric: from 0 to 20, output target)
